test_description: Verify offline service request completion syncs correctly upon network restoration
business_risk: High - Data loss leads to billing errors and technician rework
preconditions: Technician logged in; 'Work In Progress' job loaded; Network disabled
test_steps: 1. Enter completion notes; 2. Add parts used; 3. Capture signature; 4. Tap 'Mark Resolved'; 5. Verify local queue state; 6. Enable network; 7. Verify backend sync
expected_result: Data queued locally; Job status updates to 'Resolved' on backend immediately after reconnection; No data loss
test_data_needs: Assigned Service Request; Mock signature image; Parts list
tools_required: Detox (Mobile); Mock Service Worker; Network Link Conditioner
dependencies: WatermelonDB local store; Background sync service
environment_requirements: Physical Device or Emulator with network control
cleanup_requirements: Reset job status; Clear local DB

test_description: Validate end-to-end latency of technician GPS updates to consumer map
business_risk: Medium - Poor UX if laggy; reduced trust
preconditions: Technician 'Travel Mode' active; Consumer connected to WebSocket
test_steps: 1. Emit GPS coordinate from Technician client; 2. Timestamp emission; 3. Backend relay via Redis; 4. Receive at Consumer client; 5. Timestamp reception; 6. Calculate delta
dependencies: Redis Pub/Sub; WebSocket Gateway; Azure Maps
security_considerations: WSS encryption; JWT validation on socket connect

test_description: Verify PostGIS routing logic selects correct service center based on geofence
business_risk: Critical - Requests routed to wrong center cause delays
preconditions: Service Center A with Polygon A; Service Center B with Polygon B; User Address inside Polygon A
test_steps: 1. Create Service Request with User Address; 2. Trigger routing logic; 3. Verify assigned Service Center ID
expected_result: Service Request assigned to Service Center A
